lead_paragraph: Spain forward Nolito has joined Manchester City from Celta Vigo on a four-year contract, the Premier League side said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Manchester City Sign Spain's Nolito From Celta Vigo
headline.main: Manchester City Sign Spain's Nolito From Celta Vigo

snippet: Spain forward Nolito has joined Manchester City from Celta Vigo on a four-year contract, the Premier League side said on Friday....
